msbt.message: The sequel to this game I've been waiting on for FOREVER is finally out!Rad Samurai Driver 9 is, just, WOW. When I'm playing it, I just forget what time it is!But nobody else is going to help that samurai race those gyroids, so it's up to me!Justneed anapfirst

I've been waiting FOREVER for the new Super Gyroid Brothers game, SGB3: Prelude of SGBIV, Part 2. AND IT'S FINALLY OOOUUUT! So! Fab!I asked if wanted to play, but said no.I think just knows I'd beat at it.

I never used to be the type to stick out in a crowd, but a pop star has to sparkle!Once I started learning about fashion and makeup, I began developing my look!I aim for "pop star," but it keeps turning into "video-game villain"<10_4 /> You know? Could be cool either way!
My favorite musician is DEFINITELY K.K.!
That beautiful voice Ahhh! Just thinking about it makes my heart POUND!Next time I see him live, I am SO TOTES going to ask for an autograph!
My favorite song of his is probably the bonus track on the purple vinyl edition of his third studio album""! That melody really gets you right here, you know?!

My favorite song of his is whatever one I'm listening to when you ask me that question!And "" too. That song gives me life. It reminds me who I amAnd the DJ KK remix of ""?! Le beaucoup très SWOOOOON!
I think I read comics more than most folks do

The one I'm reading now is called Forehead Secrets! <10_4 />It's a thriller!<10_4 /> About foreheads!It's full of forehead-tingling suspense! Whose forehead did the thing? Which forehead will prove it?. It makes NO SENSE. At all! Not a lick! I love it!

The one I'm reading now is called Seriously/Not Funny and it's a comic aboutstand-up comics!Stand-up comics are folks who like to hang out in dark rooms and tell other folks jokes, I guess?I'm not explaining it right, but I am so totally hooked!Folks on like to laugh, so maybe I should try adding stand-up comedy to my repertoire!

The one I'm reading now is called Unmatched Socks. It's a detective comic!The main character wears a different sock on each foot. Oh! And she solves a bunch of crimes!The reason why her socks don't match is the real mystery, though!
Oh, hi! I have some le bonkers comics I think you'd like, !

There's this fab comic about cooking called Fairy in the Kitchen. Have you ever heard of it? One day, the main character finds a fairy living in their kitchen! But! It's, like, the WORST fairy! It's just a tiny, angry old man that tries to fight everyone and says bad puns like, "Ya wanna PIZZA me?"Ohmigosh, it's a great comic, but NO. Who needs a grody fairy like that?

I've been reading this spy comic called You Can't See Me, My Eyes Are Closed! Ever heard of it?It's about a spy with 20/20 vision who goes undercover at an evil companystaffed ONLY by people with bad eyesight! It makes more sense if you don't think about it. AnyhooIn the latest issue, everyone takes an eye test! And if he can't find a way to failhe's busted!I can't wait to see what happens next!

There's this one comic called Mr. Beard's Hairventure! Ever heard of it?The main character is a guy whose beard finds this mysterious treasure map, and they go on an adventure!If you pre-ordered the first issue, you got a Legendary Beard Trimmer, butI can't grow a beard.And, I don't get ithow is there supposed to be a hairventure if the beard gets shaved?
Going to a concert for an artist you are totally in love with is, like, SUPER exciting!

When I went to this K.K. show the other week, I made a totally original T-shirt to wear!'K, so it's a BRIGHT PINK T-shirt, right? And I used a marker to write big capital letters across the chest"EYEBROWS!" Isn't that just the BEST?I asked if wear one and go with me, but said had to go off-island
I love taking signs to concerts!I made a K.K. sign once! It said "K.K. IS OK" and the letters were glitter. I did a très glam job.

It's totes fun to just GO to a concert, but it's WAY more fun when you take stuff to show your support!ALL the things I take to K.K. shows are handmade! I've made signs, banners, and towels! I have no idea what the towels were for. I just got excited and started writing his name on EVERYTHING!

When I see a magazine—they still exist—and there's a musician I like, even if it's just one pageI buy it!Anyway, lately I've done NOTHING but cut things out of magazines and glue them into my scrapbook.Nothing, I HAVE to show it to you sometime. Everyone who sees my scrapbook has opinions. I want to hear yours!
I have to get all the latest news, so I watch ALL the TV music shows!

I think my favorite show is definitely probably Pop-Star Dunk!It's a contest. If the judges don't like your song, a trapdoor opens and you're dunked in cold water!But if they love your song, you get a recording contract!Someday, I want to perform on Pop-Star Dunk and win it all!<10_4 /> Although a dunk could be fun too!

I mean, it's not like I watch them all when they air! I record anything that's on late at night.But if there's somebody I NEED to see—everybody, duh?—I totally stay up and watch!I always oversleep the next day, but it's OK. I don't actually have any responsibilities!
